play.description: Play music from a query or URL stream

fplay.description: Fast search on youtube and stream it on the current voice channel

ping.description: Display the average heartbeat of the bot

invite.description: Print the invite code with right permissions for a new guild bot integration

stop.description: Stop playing current music (equal as leave)

leave.description: Leave from the current voice channel

join.description: Join to your current voice channel

roll.description: Roll a dice with a specific number range
